instructions: Sauté 2 onions in a pan until golden brown. Add paprika, followed by chopped tomatoes and sliced green hot pepper. Season to taste.
Sauté for about 10 minutes, then add a can of tomato paste and continue to sauté for another 10 minutes.
Add water, diced potatoes, and chicken to the mixture. Stir well and let it simmer until the chicken is cooked through and the potatoes are tender.
notes: This dish is a traditional Tunisian-Djerban Jewish recipe, known for its rich flavors and hearty ingredients. Serve it warm with bread or rice for a complete meal.
